page.title: 05A day in Carolyn's life.
page.content: A typical day for me would be to get up at 7.20 a.m. Then I would get dressed and washed. At 7.40 a.m.I would have my breakfast. I would have cereal and maybe some toast and a cup of coffee. Then I would clean my teeth and brush my hair. Then I would pack my bag. At 8.15 a.m. my best friend Carolyn would come to call on me to walk up with me. We get to school at approximately 8.40 a.m. We go upstairs to the music room until 9.00 a.m. when the bell goes.We do Maths until 10.30 a.m. which is playtime After play we do English until 12.00 p.m. We return from lunch at 1.00 p.m.and we have Humanities.We have other lessons and go home at 3.30 p.m. I play with Carolyn until 8.00p.m. We go to the park which has, a climbing frame a seat and see-saw.I then go in the bath, have supper and go to bed.
